original_title: Sesame Street: Elmo's World: The Street We Live On!
overview: Elmo's World celebrates 35 years of Sesame Street. Elmo wants to know more about the street he lives on, so Grover takes him on a trip back in time to see what Sesame Street was like before Elmo was born.
title: Sesame Street: Elmo's World: The Street We Live On!
